item.title: Bessent to propose major overhaul of regulatory body created from financial crisis
item.description: In a letter set to be released Thursday, Bessent will recommend changing the approach of the Financial Stability Oversight Council.

item.title: The case for more Fed rate cuts could rest on a 'systematic overcount' of jobs numbers
item.description: There are indications that policymakers will be more inclined to cut further if the labor market stays weak.

item.title: U.S. has to stop taking in 'below-average' immigrants who won't help economy, says Lutnick
item.description: The White House is rolling out its gold card visa.
